pkgmetadata.longdescription: # Prodigy: An Expeditiously Adaptive Parameter-Free LearnerThis is the official repository of [our paper](https://arxiv.org/pdf/2306.06101.pdf) that proposed the Prodigy optimizer. Currently, the code is only in PyTorch.Prodigy: An Expeditiously Adaptive Parameter-Free LearnerK. Mishchenko, A. DefazioPaper: https://arxiv.org/pdf/2306.06101.pdf## How to citeIf you find our work useful, please consider citing our paper.```@article{mishchenko2023prodigy, title={Prodigy: An Expeditiously Adaptive Parameter-Free Learner}, author={Mishchenko, Konstantin and Defazio, Aaron}, journal={arXiv preprint arXiv:2306.06101}, year={2023}, url={https://arxiv.org/pdf/2306.06101.pdf}}```
